Storm_Kick.help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Storm Kick has a greater then average chance to score a critical hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Crane_Kick.help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Dragons_Tail.help: This low spinning kick deals slightly more damage than Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.shortHelp: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

Storm_Kick_Jaunt.help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your foes before delivering a powerful Storm Kick. Note that Storm Kick is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Crane_Kick_Jaunt.help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your target before delivering a crushing Crane Kick. Note that Crane Kick is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Moderate

Dragons_Tail_Chain.help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your target before striking with the Dragon's Tail attack. Note that Dragon's Tail Chain is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Slow

Dragons_Tail_Jaunt.help: Channeling the power of the Maelstrom Device, you teleport to your target before striking with the Dragon's Tail attack. Note that Dragon's Tail is unaffected by Range changes. Recharge: Very Fast
